public class Solution {
public void FindNumsAppearOnce(int[] array, int[] num1, int[] num2) {
int length = array.length;
if(length == 2){
num1[0] = array[0];
num2[0] = array[1];
return;
}
int bitResult = 0;
for(int i = 0; i < length; ++i){
bitResult ^= array[i];
}
int index = findFirst1(bitResult);
for(int i = 0; i < length; ++i){
if(isBit1(array[i], index)){
num1[0] ^= array[i];
}else{
num2[0] ^= array[i];
}
}
}

private int findFirst1(int bitResult){    int index = 0;    while(((bitResult & 1) == 0) && index < 32){        bitResult >>= 1;        index++;    }    return index;}private boolean isBit1(int target, int index){    return ((target >> index) & 1) == 1;}

}

å¦‚æœç”¨å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(nlogn)ï¼›å¦‚æœç”¨å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼Œæ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(nk)/
import java.util.ArrayList;
public class Solution {
public ArrayList GetLeastNumbers_Solution(int [] input, int k) {
ArrayList list=new ArrayList();
//æ£€æŸ¥è¾“å…¥çš„ç‰¹æ®Šæƒ…å†µ
if(input==null || input.length<=0 || input.length=0; lenâ€”){
adjustMaxHeapSort(input,len,k-1);
}
//ä»ç¬¬kä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹åˆ†åˆ«ä¸æœ€å¤§å †çš„æœ€å¤§å€¼åšæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¦‚æœæ¯”æœ€å¤§å€¼å°ï¼Œåˆ™æ›¿æ¢å¹¶è°ƒæ•´å †ã€‚
//æœ€ç»ˆå †é‡Œçš„å°±æ˜¯æœ€å°çš„Kä¸ªæ•°ã€‚
int tmp;
for(int i=k; i<input.length; i++){
if(input[i]<input[0]){
tmp=input[0];
input[0]=input[i];
input[i]=tmp;
adjustMaxHeapSort(input,0,k-1);
}
}
for(int j=0; j<k; j++){
list.add(input[j]);
}
return list;
}

public void adjustMaxHeapSort(int[] input, int pos, int length){    int temp;    int child;    for(temp=input[pos]; 2*pos+1<=length; pos=child){        child=2*pos+1;        if(child<length && input[child]<input[child+1]){            child++;        }        if(input[child]>temp){            input[pos]=input[child];        }else{            break;        }    }    input[pos]=temp;}

}

public class Solution {
public void Mirror(TreeNode root) {
if(root == null){
return;
}

    TreeNode temp;    if(root!=null){        temp = root.left;        root.left = root.right;        root.right = temp;    }    if(root.left!=null){        Mirror(root.left);        }    if(root.right!=null){        Mirror(root.right);    }}

}

entry.content:
å®ä½“å®Œæ•´æ€§è¦æ±‚æ¯ä¸ªè¡¨éƒ½æœ‰å”¯ä¸€æ ‡è¯†ç¬¦ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¡¨ä¸­çš„ä¸»é”®å­—æ®µä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©ºæˆ–è€…é‡å¤çš„å€¼ã€‚

å‚ç…§å®Œæ•´æ€§è¦æ±‚å…³ç³»ä¸­ä¸å…è®¸å¼•ç”¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨çš„å®ä½“ã€‚è®¾å®šç›¸åº”çš„æ›´æ–°åˆ é™¤æ’å…¥è§„åˆ™æ¥æ›´æ–°å‚è€ƒè¡¨ã€‚

Javaè¯­è¨€ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯

public static int WithException(){

int i=10;

try{

System.out.println(â€œi in try block is ï¼š â€œ+i);

i = i/0;

return â€”i;

}

catch(Exception e){

System.out.println(â€œi in catch - form try block is ï¼š â€œ+i);

â€”i;

System.out.println(â€œi in catch block is ï¼š â€œ+i);

return â€”i;

}

finally{

System.out.println(â€œi in finally - from try or catch block isâ€”â€œ+i);

â€”i;

System.out.println(â€œi in finally block isâ€”â€œ+i);

return â€”i;

}

}

============WithException==================

i in try block is ï¼š 10

i in catch - form try block is ï¼š 10

i in catch block is ï¼š 9

i in finally - from try or catch block isâ€”8

i in finally block isâ€”7
